item.description:
This is a members-only meeting which means you must have paid the full dues and signed the statement of ethics prior to the meeting to be able to attend. No visitors are allowed at this meeting because of confidentiality rules.

Being a member of this meetup group is not the same as being a member of the Innovators Resource Network. Let us know if you have questions regarding this.

It is not too late to email us if you would like to present about your idea or progress report.

Note: it is always a good idea to rsvp "Yes" to meetup events. That way organizers can contact only the people who rsvp'ed with any updates or changes to the event, instead of emailing the whole list.

IRN members - do you want to present to the closed meeting ? - This is a closed meeting and your opportunity to get a focus group and/or advice or else inform us of your progress. Please email or contact us if you wish to take advantage of this - (message Michael or Craig here or email info@irnetwork.org
item.name: July Members Only IRN Meeting - July 6, Wed.
